Comments_List:
Strengths: small class size, very engaging and knowledgeable classmates and professor, Beinecke Sessions, and intellectually rewarding homework exercises 
Weakness: It would be very nice if we went to the Beinecke more often!

Yes, if you are genuinely interested to undertake serious archive-research-oriented scholarship in Sinology, or curious about how  in Chinese University would be taught. Be prepare to read Classical Chinese from archive. The class sessions in Beinecke were such a bliss.
